newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Supertel rating cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Supertel rating cut.

text.p: - Chicago Corp said Wednesday it downgraded its rating on Supertel Hospitality Inc to hold from buy and trimmed its earnings projections to $0.71 a share from $0.84 for 1996, and to $0.77 from $0.90 for 1997.
- It said the estimate cuts are a result of lower expected occupancy assumptions and the expectation of further margin contraction, Chicago Corp said in a report.
- The rating cut is due to expected negative year-to-year earnings comparisons over the next two quarters and a slower anticipated seasoning process in Texas, a new market for Supertel.
